Plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.
Title: Splash
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 8 nominations.
Actors: Tom Hanks, Daryl Hannah, Eugene Levy, John Candy
Writer: Brian Grazer (story), Bruce Jay Friedman (screen story), Lowell Ganz (screenplay), Babaloo Mandel (screenplay), Bruce Jay Friedman (screenplay)
